mapper.select: SELECT MEMSCHCTIY.MS_CTIY_SEQ, MS_DAY, MS_DATE, MS_COUNTRY_NAME, MS_CITY_NAME FROM MEMSCHATTR JOIN MEMSCHCTIY ON MEMSCHATTR.MS_CTIY_SEQ = MEMSCHCTIY.MS_CTIY_SEQ JOIN MEMSCH ON MEMSCH.MS_SEQ = MEMSCHCTIY.MS_SEQ JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = MEMSCH.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_ID LIKE #{id} AND MEMSCH.MS_TITLE LIKE #{title} GROUP BY MEMSCHCTIY.MS_CTIY_SEQ, MS_DAY, MS_DATE, MS_COUNTRY_NAME, MS_CITY_NAME

SELECT MS_ATTR_NAME, MS_DAY FROM MEMSCHATTR JOIN MEMSCHCTIY ON MEMSCHATTR.MS_CTIY_SEQ = MEMSCHCTIY.MS_CTIY_SEQ JOIN MEMSCH ON MEMSCH.MS_SEQ = MEMSCHCTIY.MS_SEQ JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = MEMSCH.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_ID LIKE #{id} AND MEMSCH.MS_TITLE LIKE #{title}
SELECT *,(SELECT IMG_URL FROM IMAGE WHERE IMG_NAME LIKE MEMSCH.MS_COUNTRY_NAME) IMG_URL FROM MEMSCH JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = MEMSCH.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_ID LIKE #{value}
